short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically close unwanted tabs using custom keywords and a user-defined timer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
---
Frustrated with having to close unwanted tabs used only for redirection? Let Tab Closer do that for you!

Key Features
- Keyword Blacklist: Identify keywords in the URL of tabs to trigger auto-tab closure.
- Delay Time: Set a period before auto-closure of tabs.
- Toggle Feature: Enable/Disable the extension as per your need.

Note
This extension operates by scanning the URLs of tabs only. It does not evaluate the content within the pages themselves.

Source: https://github.com/shimo164/tab-closer
